front.title: IEEE Standard Computer Dictionary: A Compilation of IEEE Standard Computer Glossaries

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Identifies terms currently in use in the computer field. Standard definitions for thoseterms are established. Compilation of IEEE Stds IEEE Std 1084, IEEE Std 610.2, IEEE Std 610.3, IEEE Std 610.4, IEEE Std 610.5 and IEEE Std 610.12
